src.sarahwissocq.armandbour.yougotmail.models

Class City

  • java.lang.Object
    • src.sarahwissocq.armandbour.yougotmail.models.City

  • public class City
extends java.lang.Object
    The City class represents a city containing several Inhabitants, and managing mails between them.
    Author:
    Armand BOUR, Sarah WISSOCQ

        Removes a inhabitant from the city.
        Parameters:
        inhabitant - The inhabitant to remove.
        Returns:
        true if the inhabitant was successfully removed ;
        false if it does not exist in the city.
